get_and_unzip_archive.desc: received from web (if needed) and unzip archive

pull.desc: If shared, pull from shared repository

push.desc: If shared, push and commit to shared repository

recache.desc: recache all local repositories (to speed up search)

unzip.desc: unzip entries to a given repo

where.desc: find path to a local repository
